Reviews.Title: “NH Hotel - Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a NH Hoteles traveler
Reviews.Content: It was a pleasure to me to stay in NH Hotel (Madrid). The hotel was nice and clean, people were helpful! Thank you

Reviews.Title: “nice for the meaning of the trip”
Reviews.Author: Paulinha28
Reviews.Content: We ent to Madrid for World Youth Day, the location of the hotel is amazing!!!! the room is very cute, but was full of dusty, but nice tv, nice air conditioner, nice toilet, good for sleeping, Breakfast is not good at all, but worthed for just one night.

Reviews.Title: “does exactly what it says on the label!”
Reviews.Author: nononsens
Reviews.Content: Practical and comfortable. A good location if you want to see a bit of local life after a busy day. The hotel offers a reasonable breakfast and good business amenities (ie free wifi and desk). There is no bar but there are a few nice bars on the same road. Very close to the metro and a walking distance to the traditional business district, although, increasingly business are located in out of town complexes which are generally easily accessible by public transport.

Reviews.Title: “I stay in hotels all the time and I like this!”
Reviews.Author: girlinmotion101
Reviews.Content: I read most of the reviews and was fully prepared to dislike this hotel. The man at the Front Desk was really helpful and spoke no English. When I asked for directions he broke out a map,when I couldn't figure out the air conditioning he came up and turned it on. The wifi worked the whole time and the room looked exactly like the picture. This is a small property that is in Madrid but a suburb. The metro is 100 feet away and if you stay here you must know it is not centrally located. But it is clean extremely inexpensive and a great value. Did I mention free continental breakfast and free wifi? It is a budget hotel so if you want to stay at a 5* resort than pay for one.

Reviews.Title: “Poor hotel, but free breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Viajero772
Reviews.Content: The only reason to stay at the NH Practico is the free breakfast. The room was not comfortable and the WiFi didn't work during most of the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Please avoid Hotel Utsav”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: Very dirty rooms, no where close to the ones seen in pics online. Hotel is a bit far from the temple and the hotel staff are not interested in arranging transport for guests.

Reviews.Title: “Lacks Basic Sanitationy and Elementary Service”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: This Hotel should be taken out from your list...................... Horrible...... Towels Dirtiest I have ever seen in my life Bedsheet , Toilets dirty No Lift No Room Service No Break Fast available One of the most horrible experence

Reviews.Title: “BAD accomodation at Utsav”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: I have gone with my mom and nephew for a non-a/c single room. First of all, the distance is too bad...its very far from the temple and there is no proper commute if you dont have your own vehicle. Secondly, the bedsheets and bathroom were not clean. The premises and aisles towards the rooms of the hotel were bad. All in all, i dont suggest this hotel for a comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Worth hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: Its good hotel with good facilities and services. Good location with free parking and hot water facility.

Reviews.Title: “CHEATING”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: cleartrip give a confairmation for two a/c room, but hotel had one

Reviews.Title: “-”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: the price charged is high but the hotel is very cheap and bad. i would definitely not recommend this to anyone rather discourage anyone doing so.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Experience .... *** PLEASE Don't book in this Hotel ***”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: As per Cleartrip, the hotel is 1 km from Shirdi temple. However it is more than 4km frm the main temple. The behaviour by the Hotel manager would turn ur mood off. There is no room service though they charge 1500 per day for A/C rooms. rooms are very small & A/Cs are old enough to work properly. Really a horrible experience. My advise to Cleartrip is not to give false information.

HotelInfo.Name: NH Practico
HotelInfo.Address: Bravo Murillo 304, 28020 Madrid, Spain
